title: anatharakshaka
sahitya:
anAtharakSaka guha arashE nI varuga migha anAthan Erkkumuruga arul peruga



anupallavi



manAtIta mati vadanA vArija daLa nayanA jnAnamuda vacanA enAnavilum



caraNam



narALi veruviya AyirALi mukhan uyir un carALiyAm sharavaNabhava sharabhamE

svara jAlavarALi maruvum kuzhal vaLLi maNavALA guruparA subhakara kavi

kunjaradAsan enaiyALa
